original: intros H. destruct H as [x1 [Px1 Ux1]]. exists x1. split. - apply Px1. - intros x2 [Px2 Ux2]. apply completeness with (fun x => P x /\ x = x1) x2. * intros x Px. split. + apply Px. + apply Eqdep_dec.K_dec_on. apply RAnalysis5.decidable. * exists x1. split. + split. ++ apply Px1. ++ reflexivity. + intros x Px. apply proj2_sig in Px. rewrite <- Px. apply Ux1.
